Room.Name: Over Western Lake Kista
Room.ShortDescription: You are above the western shore of Lake Kista. 25.n0.e26.s8.w0
Room.LongDescription: The copper dragon you are riding signals she would like a drink, and would like to descend. You are at the eastern limit of how far the dragon will fly, and she normally rests here before returning to Brownhaven.
